additional_data.description: The spirit of a mythic Japanese sword that defeated Yamata-no-Orochi. Though she's technically a servant of Susanoo, in reality she likes to make fun of him... it's kind of an unhealthy relationship. Otherwise, she's very nice and does whatever Lady Kushinada says.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦"Is this Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-" Event: Defeat LVL 70, 80, 90 Yamata-no-Orochi.
◦"Is this Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-" Event: Random drops after LVL 70.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦  Increase damage dealt by 20% while battling Yamata-no-Orochi during the "Is this Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-" event.

skill: "I'll cut them all off...every last one!"
limit_break: "Ah, so much power... Where's Susanoo when you need someone to bully?"
